Name: Hellen's Group
description:
Hellen, pictured above, has been a farmer for 5 years, and is now proud to represent her group of 6 farmers in Matete District. She is 29 years old, married and has 3 children.

Hellen likes to think of herself as a very experienced farmer. She has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2017 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers. She says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that she has been able to consistently feed her family. Hellen plans to use the profits from this coming season to rent more land to cultivate in.

In total, Hellenâ€™s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 2 acres of land. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 4 solar lights.
